system.description: You can connect with those around you on a more esoteric level. You gain telepathy out to a range of 60 feet. Additionally, you may choose to allow creatures that you are communicating with telepathically to read your surface thoughts, as in the spell @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.4rgo85d49qwancup]{Detect Thoughts}. If an enemy creature attempts to read your mind or magically control you (such as the spell @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.9s4sb34j24r74328]{Dominate Person}), you have advantage on your saving throw.
